Class ProjectRootManagerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.util.SimpleModificationTracker

        • com.intellij.openapi.roots.ex.ProjectRootManagerEx
          • com.intellij.openapi.roots.impl.ProjectRootManagerImpl
            • com.intellij.openapi.roots.impl.ProjectRootManagerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseComponent, NamedComponent, PersistentStateComponent<Element>, ProjectComponent, Disposable, ModificationTracker

    public class ProjectRootManagerComponent
extends ProjectRootManagerImpl
implements ProjectComponent, Disposable
    ProjectRootManager extended with ability to watch events.

      • projectOpened

        public void projectOpened()
        Description copied from interface: ProjectComponent
        Invoked when the project corresponding to this component instance is opened.

        Note that components may be created for even unopened projects and this method can be never invoked for a particular component instance (for example for default project).

        Specified by:
        projectOpened in interface ProjectComponent

        Description copied from interface: ProjectComponent
        Invoked when the project corresponding to this component instance is closed.

        Note that components may be created for even unopened projects and this method can be never invoked for a particular component instance (for example for default project).
